text: Saman Faezi (born August 23, 1991 in Tehran) is an Iranian volleyball player. He is currently a member of club Paykan. He was named a member of Iran's National volleyball team to play in the 2014 World Championship in Poland. ==Achievements== ===Individual=== * Best Blocker: 2011 Asian Youth Boys Volleyball Championship ==References== ==Other websites== * Scores Way Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian sportspeople Category:Volleyball players
title: Saman Faezi
